aspecttable.name: Amtrak-2010
aspecttable.reference: As described on Railroad Signals of the US website

aspect.name: Cab Speed
aspect.indication: Proceed in accordance with cab signal indication. Reduce speed to not exceeding 60 MPH if Cab Speed cab signal is displayed without a signal speed, or if cab signals are not operative.

aspect.name: Approach Limited
aspect.indication: Proceed approaching the next signal at Limited Speed.

aspect.name: Limited Clear
aspect.indication: Proceed at Limited Speed until entire train clears all interlocking or spring switches, then proceed at Normal Speed.

aspect.name: Approach Medium
aspect.indication: Proceed approaching the next signal at Medium Speed.

aspect.name: Advance Approach
aspect.indication: Proceed prepared to stop at the second signal. Trains exceeding Limited Speed must begin reduction to Limited Speed as soon as engine passes the Advance Approach signal

aspect.name: Medium Clear
aspect.indication: Proceed at Medium Speed until entire train clears all interlocking or spring switches, then proceed at Normal Speed.

aspect.name: Approach Slow
aspect.indication: Proceed approaching the next signal at Slow Speed. Trains exceeding Medium Speed must begin reduction to Medium Speed as soon as the engine passes the Approach Slow signal.

aspect.name: Approach
aspect.indication: Proceed prepared to stop at the next signal. Trains exceeding Medium Speed must begin reduction to Medium Speed as soon as the engine passes the Approach signal.

aspect.name: Medium Approach
aspect.indication: Proceed prepared to stop at the next signal. Trains exceeding Medium Speed must begin reduction to Medium Speed as soon as the Medium Approach signal is clearly visible.

aspect.name: Slow Approach
aspect.indication: Proceed prepared to stop at next signal. Slow Speed applies until entire train clears all interlocking or spring switches, then Medium Speed applies

aspect.name: Restricting
aspect.indication: Proceed at Restricted Speed until the entire train has cleared all interlocking and spring switches (if signal is an interlocking or CP Signal).

aspect.name: Stop and Proceed
aspect.indication: Stop, then proceed at Restricted Speed until the entire train has cleared all interlocking and spring switches (if signal is an inter-locking or CP signal)
